com.github.fge.filesystem.readonly

Class ReadOnlyFileSystemProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.file.spi.FileSystemProvider
      • com.github.fge.filesystem.readonly.ReadOnlyFileSystemProvider

  • public final class ReadOnlyFileSystemProvider
extends FileSystemProvider
    Read only wrapper over an existing FileSystemProvider

    This wrapper delegates all read only methods to the provider given as an argument to the constructor, and throws ReadOnlyFileSystemException for write-only methods, or methods which may include writes.

    Limitations:

    • for methods having a set of OpenOptions as an argument, this class only knows about the standard open options provided by the JDK (see StandardOpenOption);
    • attribute views obtained via getFileAttributeView(Path, Class, LinkOption...) do not prevent writes.
